root.name: *NSYNC Hotline Phone and Fantasy CD-Rom Game
root.description: The game was developed by Stunt Puppy Entertainment and published by Atari. The game comes with a Fantasy Phone that has pre-recorded sound bites from the members of NSYNC.System RequirementsPentium II 233MHz Processor32MB RAM80MB Hard Disk Space8X CD-ROM Drive2MB SVGA Video Card16-bit Sound Card with Gameport- DirectX 8.0
